title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Indigenous Community-Based Design Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively develop at least three design solutions connected to local culture.
Learners can visualize Indigenous design knowledge (storytelling, natural material use, etc.) by combining it with modern tools.
Learners can create and present design prototypes for solving local issues using smartphone tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
